channel.title: Anyway to make some commands not work in wildy?
channel.description: Is there a way to make it so you can't use a command in the wild? Such as bank? Or pickup? I'm using deltascape. Is it possible??

item.title: Anyway to make some commands not work in wildy?
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

this code works for 100%

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kbd”) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {
toX = 2273;
toY = 4695;

}[/code]
so its very simple yust add && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) { afther evry command and players wont be able to use it in wilderness.
offcours u can do this with other commands like teleports exemple

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

I ONLY TESTED THIS ON DELTA , SO I DONT KNOW IF IT WORKES ON OTHER BASES.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyway to make some commands not work in wildy?

item.title: Anyway to make some commands not work in wildy?

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

i am posting on my wii bare wii me

if command.startswith(“health”); && !wildy {
addhp = 99
sendmessage(“don`t use in wild!”);
}

sorry if i didn`t follow to conventions i just read some of it but

ontopic i think that might work and the caps button didn`t work sorry
